column4: hi all, I have a problem with the eperl package on 10.04 it hangs on install forever and dpkg wont even kill -9. I now have an install of eperl that requires an install to remove, but the install hangs every time after unpacking. Does anyone have a tip on how to remove the package?
you can edit the dpkg status file and remove it that way, backup the file before playing
unblocked now, thanks. Not had to actually get down and dirty with apt before in 10 years of desktop use ;)
